page.title: 12Shopping
page.content: Many of the small villages in the block do not have shops and so the Milborne Port shops are well supported. There are 3 butchers,1 greengrocer,1 haberdasher,1 baker,1 pharmacist,1 ironmonger,3 general stores and a newsagent. When surveyed the shop keepers were,on the whole,happy with trading in Milborne Port.They stated that as the population of the area was increasing all the time their trade was improving. They all employed local people.As they are in constant competition with the large supermarkets in Yeovil they all felt the need to keep their prices as low as possible.Most people surveyed did at least 45% of their shopping in the village.
